amendment.description: To provide follow-up services to individuals who have received opioid overdose reversal drugs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3374 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3374 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 3378. (consideration: CR S1206; text as modified: CR S1206) To provide follow-up services to individuals who have received opioid overdose reversal drugs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3374 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3374 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 3378.
